description: A clean code should be elegant, efficient, readable, simple, without duplications, and well-written. You should add value to the business with your code. Clean code offers quality and understanding when we open a class. It is necessary that your code is clean and readable for anyone to find and easily understand.

Don't Make Me Think is a book by Steve Krug about humanâ€“computer interaction and web usability. The book's premise is that a good software program or web site should let users accomplish their intended tasks as easily and directly as possible.
